amendment.description: Amendment requires the Environmental Protection Agency to hire the appropriate number of criminal investigators as required by law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the EPA Administrator's security detail.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Stupak.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
